a.title: Legend for this format

description.value: EHDS refined base model for Patient Summary

short.value: Patient summary model

definition.value: EHDS refined base model for Patient Summary

short.value: Document header elements

definition.value: Common header for all patient-related data
Patient/subject information

short.value: Document ID

definition.value: Unique identifier of the document
Resource authoring details
Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.

short.value: Date and time of authoring/issuing

definition.value: Date and time of the issuing the document/resource by its author.

short.value: Date and time of the last update to the resource

definition.value: Date and time of the last update to the document/information

short.value: Status of the resource

definition.value: Status of the resource

short.value: Reason for the current status of the resource.

definition.value: Reason for the current status of the resource.
Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.
Business version of the resource.

short.value: A narrative easy-to-read representation of the full data set, e.g. PDF-version of a document

definition.value: A narrative easy-to-read representation of the full data set, e.g. PDF-version of a document

short.value: Document type

definition.value: Identifies the type of document at hand, e.g. Discharge report.

short.value: Document title

definition.value: Document title, such as Discharge Report, Laboratory Result Report, etc.

short.value: Document status

definition.value: The status of the Discharge report. E.g., preliminary, final.
Time of service that is being documented
Document attestation details
Attester who validated the document. Mulitple attesters could be provided.
Date and time of the approval of the document by Attester.

short.value: Legal authentication

definition.value: Document legal authentication

short.value: Legal authenticator

definition.value: The person taking responsibility for the medical content of the document
Date and time when the document was authorized.

short.value: Event type

definition.value: Categorization of the event covered by the document (e.g. laboratory study types, imaging study types including modality, etc.). Selection of such tags or labels depends on the use case and agreement betwen data sharing parties. This meta-data element serves primarily for searching and filtering purpuses.
Additional details about where the content was created (e.g. clinical specialty)

short.value: Document custodian

definition.value: Organisation that is in charge of maintaining the document/report.

short.value: Document format

definition.value: An identifier of the document constraints, encoding, structure, and template that the document conforms to beyond the base format indicated in the mimeType.
Level of confidentiality of the document. Implicit value is normal.

short.value: Related documents and information sources

definition.value: Related documents and information sources

short.value: Section: Alerts.

definition.value: Information about substantial alerts or warnings that health professionals should be aware of.

requirements.value: eHN PS Guideline, MyHealth@EU, ISO IPS

definition.value: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

definition.value: Reason for absence of data

See general description of Patient summary modelling for more information about this element. MH@EU has a similar concept, but it is modelled in slightly different way.

short.value: Section: Social history.

definition.value: Observations on social factors such as alcohol consumption or smoking. From the healthcare perspective, life-style factors relate to well-being but can also provide a source of risk factors.

short.value: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

requirements.value: eHN PS Guideline, MyHealth@EU, ISO IPS

short.value: Section: Pregnancy history

definition.value: To present the current health state of the patient with respect to pregnancy and to provide chronological and outcome information about past pregnancies.

short.value: Generated text summary of the content in the section, for human interpretation

definition.value: Generated text summary of the content in the section, for human interpretation

short.value: Current pregnancy status

definition.value: Current state of the pregnancy at the date the observation was made, e.g. pregnant, not pregnant, unknown.

short.value: Overall status of previous pregnancies

definition.value: Overall status of previous pregnancies, including — Yes, previous pregnancies — No, previous pregnancies — Unknown

short.value: History of previous pregnancies

definition.value: Information about previous pregnancies, including outcomes and number of children/fetuses in each pregnancy.

short.value: Relevant information about the patient's recent travel history

definition.value: Captures relevant information about the patient's recent travel history that may be of clinical relevance — particularly in relation to exposure to infectious diseases, epidemiological risks, or environmental factors. The intent is to support clinical decision-making and risk assessment, especially in contexts such as outbreaks or endemic disease regions.

requirements.value: This element is present in MyHealth@EU specifications and ISO IPS. The proposed way of modelling is identical to the newest version of FHIR IPS IG. See general description of Patient summary modelling for more information about this element. MH@EU has a similar concept, but it is modelled in slightly different way.

definition.value: A patient's immunisation status. The section should include current immunization status and may contain the entire immunization history that is relevant to the period of time being summarised. Adverse reactions against vaccines should be documented in the allergy section.

short.value: Section: Social history.

definition.value: Observations on social factors such as alcohol consumption or smoking. From the healthcare perspective, life-style factors relate to well-being but can also provide a source of risk factors.

short.value: Section: Pregnancy history

definition.value: To present the current health state of the patient with respect to pregnancy and to provide chronological and outcome information about past pregnancies.

definition.value: Generated text summary of the content in the section, for human interpretation

short.value: Current pregnancy status

definition.value: Current state of the pregnancy at the date the observation was made, e.g. pregnant, not pregnant, unknown.

short.value: Overall status of previous pregnancies

definition.value: Overall status of previous pregnancies, including — Yes, previous pregnancies — No, previous pregnancies — Unknown

short.value: History of previous pregnancies

definition.value: Information about previous pregnancies, including outcomes and number of children/fetuses in each pregnancy.

short.value: Relevant information about the patient's recent travel history

definition.value: Captures relevant information about the patient's recent travel history that may be of clinical relevance — particularly in relation to exposure to infectious diseases, epidemiological risks, or environmental factors. The intent is to support clinical decision-making and risk assessment, especially in contexts such as outbreaks or endemic disease regions.

short.value: What the patient believes to be important for the attending clinician to know.

definition.value: A concise narrative from the patient’s perspective about their present health state. This is a record of the things that a person feels it is important to communicate about their needs, strengths, values, concerns and preferences to others providing support and care.

short.value: Narrative containing the plan including proposals, goals, and order requests for monitoring, tracking, or improving the condition of the patient. In the future it is expected that this Section could be provided in a structured and coded format.
